analytic.title: From “Shiyuan 十願” (Ten Vows) to “Shijie 十誡” (Ten Commandments): Importance of Absent Elements in Translation as Case Study of Inculturation of Christianity during the Early Tang Dynasty (7th Century)

body.bibl: Li-Layec, Zhu. “From ‘Shiyuan 十願’ (Ten Vows) to ‘Shijie 十誡’ (Ten Commandments): Importance of Absent Elements in Translation as Case Study of Inculturation of Christianity during the Early Tang Dynasty (7th Century).” In Yearbook of Chinese Theology 2018, edited by Paulos Z. Huang, Xiaofeng Tang, and Donghua Zhu, 82–93. Yearbook of Chinese Theology 4. Leiden: Brill, 2019.
